TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UnescapedXmlDiagnosticData extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides unescaped XML data for the logging of user-provided trace data.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class is used by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.TraceData%2A> methods. It can also be used to pass XML data to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.TraceData%2A> methods.
> [!NOTE] > The user-provided data is not checked for schema validity.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use UnescapedXmlDiagnosticData class. This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener> class.
[!code-cs[System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener#11](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.diagnostics.une_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener#11](~/add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.diagnostics.une_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string xmlPayload) cil managed

Docs.param: The XML data to be logged in the node of the event schema.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified XML data string.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If you want your code to be end-to-end schema-compliant, the `xmlPayload` parameter must be an XML fragment that can be validated against the end-to-end event schema. If `xmlPayload` is `null`, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.UnescapedXmlDiagnosticData.UnescapedXml%2A> property is an empty string.
> [!NOTE] > `xmlPayload` is not checked for XML validity.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the UnescapedXmlDiagnosticData constructor. This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener> class.
[!code-cs[System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener#11](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/m-system.diagnostics.une_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener#11](~/add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/m-system.diagnostics.une_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a string representation of the object.
Gets or sets the unescaped XML data string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If you want your code to be end-to-end schema-compliant, the UnescapedXml property value must be an XML fragment that can be validated against the end-to-end event schema.
